data.message:
Facebook: somebody else commented on something you commented on.
Facebook: somebody else commented on something you commented on.
Facebook: somebody else commented on something you commented on.
Facebook: somebody else .... (repeat 5464 times)
Me: I don't really care, how do I shut off that notification (and all like it) FOREVER?!?!?!?!?!?!?!?!?!?!??!!!!!!!!!!!????????

replies.message: Hi Brian. You can choose what you get notifications about by following these steps in our Help Center: http://bit.ly/2uyLLcr. Thanks! -Caitlin
